name: Brian G
text: Wouldn't honor their online website pricing. Claimed it was online only, despite the website not saying it was online only. I was able to get this same deal at this same pizza hut last week. Honor your online pricing. Why should I have to pay more just for calling my order in? Choosing to shop local tonight instead.

name: R.A.
text: Our waitress, Peggy, was awesome.  Food was hot and tasty ðŸ˜‹

name: Rachel Ross
text: Quick service. Friendly staff. I wish they would come up with better variety of deals though.

name: Rose
text: Only had them for delivery so far, but they're fantastic! Never had an issue, super fast, friendly staff!

name: Fred Hipshear
text: Almost no cheese or sauce.  Very disappointing.  I did not know I had to use the app to tell them I was there,  waited 15 minutes and went in to find out what was wrong .  Pizza was cold, will never use curbside again.  Will probably get Little Ceasarâ€™s next time, cheaper and just as good!

name: Earl Mortimore
text: I ordered my pizza on line & payed for it on line sent my kids to pick it up as we have done many times in the past 6/8 months .this time they refused to give my kid the pizza without the card? What's the point of putting your card info in â€¦More

name: Michelle Jackson
text: We had a huge order of pizzas for my son's rehearsal dinner. They had it all done correctly and in time and gave us coupons to help with the cost. By far the best pizza hut i have ever been too!! Highly recommend

name: Timothy Little
text: We generally order online for pick up. For the most part the staff is friendly, though, every now and then you get a teen with an attitude. The pizza can go from really good to really bad. It's not uncommon for it to be lacking enough sauce â€¦More

name: Jenn Cooley
text: For the most part everything is good. A few times they sent us the wrong pizza or a pizza with missing items. Delivery not always up to par received pizza like warm, and should've denied it. It's a 50/50 chance if your expectations will be met.

name: Molly Nunn
text: Even with the service being curbside, the food was hot and fresh and tasted delicious!

name: Ashlie Mortimore
text: Very rude staff. Waited over 10 minutes to have someone tell me to wait just a few more minutes just so I could pick up a pizza. And then Iâ€™m told they physically need to see the card. This is new. Would have been nice to know this in the first place.

name: Brandi Espinosa
text: Great food, extra sanitary measures being taken. Delicious!

name: David Martin
text:
Pizza Hut always has the best pizza around. Sit on it pizza snobs.

Not speaking just of my own, but don't forget to "like" reviews and photos you like. This helps the reviewer.

name: Mark Conrad
text: Gave my order to someone else.

name: Jeremy Mansfield
text: Clean restaurant. Friendly staff. As far as the food, it's Pizza hut. Kinda miss the salad bar they had years back.

name: Nick S
text: If you want your pizza order carryout. It's done in less than 20 minutes. We dined in and waited 45 minutes for our pizza and there was only 1 other person there and the service was horrible. We got our drinks filled one time. Even had to go to the counter to get the bill.

name: Mark Newton
text: It's Pizza hut... Everyone knows Pizza hut. Good pizza, not great but definitely not bad. Still disappointed they got rid of pretzel crust but it's not this Pizza huts fault. If you have a Pizza hut nearby, join the Hut rewards. Can't argue with getting points from regular orders and getting a free pizza!

name: Jeff Burks
text: Yep Earl Montimore just did the same thing ordered online delivery driver wanted to see card . Not at home that's why I called in order o well will not use pizza hut anymore

text: This is my Sons Google Page, but his Moms review of this Pizza Hut. I live in Tennessee, but my 88 yr. old mother lives in Dowagiac. She loves Pizza Hut and I used to be able to treat her with a Pizza delivery every now and then. The past 2 â€¦More
